name: Lovelive - HoshizoraRin
description:
Lovelive -- Hoshizora Rin

My first Lora Model, which might still have some problem. I will keep tring to optimize and perfect this model.

modelVersions.name: xkl_v30
modelVersions.description:
完全重置版。素材重新收集，大多数使用了LLAS内的素材

Totally remake. The training material was collected again, mostly using the pics in LLAS.

训练分辨率为768*1024和1024*768

The training resolution is 768*1024 and 1024*768

仍然有过拟合的迹象，但是反复调试以后仍然决定发布这个版本，效果是最好的。可以搭配前几天发布的LLAS Style使用

There are still signs of overfitting, but i still deciside to release this version after repeated debugging. It can be used with the LLAS Style released a few days ago.

如果将他们一起使用，它们俩加起来的权重不能超过1

If you used them together, the combined weight of these two cannot over 1.0

modelVersions.name: HoshizoraRin v2.0
modelVersions.description: New version trained by 50 pictures, which include 20 3d-model pictures. With simple background, weight 0.6-0.8 will be fine (or using hoshizora_rin tag together with weight 0.4-0.6). With complex background, I recommand 0.4-0.6. Never use more than 0.8 weight which will cause terrible image. Next step I will try to use more transparent background picture to make this Lora more general.
